description: Episode number 10 of Series "Jesus of Nazareth". The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Jesus teaching the crowds in the temple; the woman caught in adultery is brought before the Pharisees in the temple; Jesus disperses her accusers 'let he who is without sin cast the first stone'; Jesus cures the Centurion's servant; Jesus cures the blind man; Jesus confronts the Pharisees and condemns their hypocrisies; Barrabas kills a Roman soldier during a riot; Jesus talking to Nicodemus in the olive grove.
related_objects: Series; S01277; Jesus of Nazareth; Active; 1977
